news.title: Lucid Group Shares Are On The Rise Today: What You Need To Know - Lucid Gr  ( NASDAQ:LCID )
news.content: Lucid Group, Inc. LCID shares are trading higher Friday after the company announced that commenced production of its second vehicle, the Gravity SUV. What To Know: On social media, Lucid Group posted a video of CEO Peter Rawlinson driving the Gravity SUV within the factory.
